response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it stands out in its category. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these aspects, I kindly propose a price of $15,000 for this product. I trust this price reflects its true value and the benefits it offers. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
